languages.text: "Я вижу, что у тебя ко мне чувства. И вижу, как ты себя накручиваешь. Когда выберемся отсюда, разберись в себе, и мы вернемся к этому разговору".
"I can see you have feelings for me. And I can see you're torturing yourself right now. Once we're out of here, you can get your head straight and we'll return to this conversation later."
languages.original_text: "Я вижу, что у тебя ко мне чувства. И вижу, как ты себя накручиваешь. Когда выберемся отсюда, разберись в себе, и мы вернемся к этому разговору".

traits.locale_text: "I can see you have feelings for me. And I can see you're becoming worked up over it. Once we're out of here, you can get your head straight and we'll return to this conversation later."
"I can see you have feelings for me. And I can see you're becoming worked up over it. Once we're out of here, you can get your head straight and we'll return to this conversation later."
"I can see you have feelings for me. And I can see you're becoming worked up over it. Once we're out of here, you can get your head straight and we'll return to this conversation later."
"I can see you have feelings for me. And I can see you're torturing yourself right now. Once we're out of here, you can get your head straight and we'll return to this conversation later."
"I can see you have feelings for me. And I can see you're torturing yourself right now. Once we're out of here, you can get your head straight and we'll return to this conversation later."

languages.text: "Ich kann sehen, dass Ihr Gefühle für mich habt. Und ich kann sehen, dass Ihr Euch gerade selbst quält. Sobald wir hier raus sind, könnt Ihr Euch besinnen und wir setzen diese Unterhaltung später fort."
languages.original_text: "I can see you have feelings for me. And I can see you're torturing yourself right now. Once we're out of here, you can get your head straight and we'll return to this conversation later."

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann sehen, dass Ihr Gefühle für mich habt. Und ich kann sehen, dass Ihr Euch gerade selbst quält. Sobald wir hier raus sind, könnt Ihr Euch besinnen und wir setzen diese Unterhaltung später fort."

languages.text: « Je vois bien que vous éprouvez quelque chose pour moi et que vous vous torturez en vous comportant ainsi. Nous reprendrons cette conversation plus tard, quand nous serons sortis d'ici et que vous aurez eu le temps de mettre de l'ordre dans vos pensées. »
languages.original_text: "I can see you have feelings for me. And I can see you're torturing yourself right now. Once we're out of here, you can get your head straight and we'll return to this conversation later."

traits.locale_text: « Je vois bien que vous éprouvez quelque chose pour moi et que vous vous torturez en vous comportant ainsi. Nous reprendrons cette conversation plus tard, quand nous serons sortis d'ici et que vous aurez eu le temps de mettre de l'ordre dans vos pensées. »

languages.text: “我看得出你对我有感觉，也看得出你在折磨你自己。等我们离开这里之后，你可以先冷静一下，之后再和我谈论这个话题。”
languages.original_text: "I can see you have feelings for me. And I can see you're torturing yourself right now. Once we're out of here, you can get your head straight and we'll return to this conversation later."

traits.locale_text: “我看得出你对我有感觉，也看得出你在折磨你自己。等我们离开这里之后，你可以先冷静一下，之后再和我谈论这个话题。”

languages.text: «Veo que siente algo por mí. Y que se está torturando. Cuando salgamos de aquí, podrá recuperar la compostura y retomaremos esta conversación».
languages.original_text: "I can see you have feelings for me. And I can see you're torturing yourself right now. Once we're out of here, you can get your head straight and we'll return to this conversation later."

traits.locale_text: «Veo que siente algo por mí. Y que se está torturando. Cuando salgamos de aquí, podrá recuperar la compostura y retomaremos esta conversación».

languages.text: 「君が{mf|俺|私}に想いを抱いているのは分かっている。そして今、自分で自分を苦しめていることもね。ここを出たら、頭を整理して、また後でこの話をしよう」
languages.original_text: "I can see you have feelings for me. And I can see you're torturing yourself right now. Once we're out of here, you can get your head straight and we'll return to this conversation later."

traits.locale_text: 「君が{mf|俺|私}に想いを抱いているのは分かっている。そして今、自分で自分を苦しめていることもね。ここを出たら、頭を整理して、また後でこの話をしよう」

languages.text: "Bana karşı hislerinden bihaber değilim. Kendine işkence ettiğinin de pek tabii farkındayım. Buradan kurtulduğumuz an kafanı toparlarsın, sonra yine bu konuyu konuşuruz."
languages.original_text: "I can see you have feelings for me. And I can see you're torturing yourself right now. Once we're out of here, you can get your head straight and we'll return to this conversation later."

traits.locale_text: "Bana karşı hislerinden bihaber değilim. Kendine işkence ettiğinin de pek tabii farkındayım. Buradan kurtulduğumuz an kafanı toparlarsın, sonra yine bu konuyu konuşuruz."
